Package controllers

package controllers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GameController
    This is GameController.java, this is where all in-game procedures take place e.g.
    GameOverController
    Controller used to handle the game over screen.
    LevelSelectController
    Level select controller - players can select what level they want to play.
    MainController
    MainController - the player entry scene loaded at start of program.
    MainMenuController
    MainMenu Controller - used to handle all interaction while in main menu.
    ProfileController
     
    ScoreboardController
    ScoreboardController - used to manage fxml elements in scoreboard scene.
    SettingsController
    Settings Controller - handles all interaction in settings.fxml.
